text: This is a list of traditional names for stars, mostly from Arabic and Latin. To find out more about any of these stars, look them up in the SIMBAD international database: * SIMBAD online __NOTOC__ == A == Proper Name Other Acamar Theta Eridani Achernar Alpha Eridani Achird Eta
